0.1.0.name: connect20/malav_discount
0.1.0.description:
The extension allows to discount on cart/order with timer. 
Admin can set discount on cart with timer for customers. Also admin can set timer and manage Discount window. Which will display according to admin selection like per day, per week, per month.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
